title: Sign up for Sport24's 'Rucking with Rob Houwing' newsletter!
text:
Cape Town - Renowned rugby guru - and Sport24 chief writer - Rob Houwing wants YOU to sign up for his 2019 Rugby World Cup 'Rucking with Rob Houwing' newsletter.

NOW!

In one easy step, you will receive the latest news, fixtures, results and updated logs in your Inbox on a Monday and Friday for the duration of the tournament in Japan.

Wait there's more!

Rob will also answer your burning questions and offer in-depth analysis on why the Springboks will win a third World Cup ... and why the All Blacks won't make it a hat-trick of titles (for example)...

Don't delay, sign up TODAY!

*** CLICK HERE TO SIGN UP FOR THE 'RUCKING WITH ROB HOUWING' NEWSLETTER ***
description: Don't delay, sign up TODAY for Sport24's 'Rucking with Rob Houwing' newsletter for all the latest news from the 2019 Rugby World Cup in Japan!
